content.rendered:
SIBA Discovery Show

Shane and Abbey Gottwals spent the last few days in Savannah at the annual SIBA (Southern Independent Booksellers Alliance) Discovery Show. They came back with a bunch of books, tons of ideas, and made lots of connections with vendors, authors, and other booksellers. They met many authors including Brent Weeks and Jodi Picoult (pictured below).

Kansas Excitement

In efforts to never be dull during franchise setup trips, our franchise crew was in an accident on the interstate this past week. As you can see, the Gottwals Books car didn’t fare well, but as you can ALSO see, the girls are OK and having fun!

Save

Save

Save
